not sure about the mod8 stuff, but you can simply copy the movie to your ps3 hard drive over the lan and it will be perfect.

@poppedtart - I checked and compared other attributes with my other files (reference frames, profile level, etc) and the height mod8 was the only thing I could spot.  Am downloading the Secret Myth Kingdom release to compare as that one uses height of 528px.
that wont really prove much, everything is different in the encode.  just sync it to your ps3, it will be fine.

The Secret Myth Kingdom release that is mod8 streams without any issues.  

I hear what you're saying; however, I want to stream rather than have to copy movies to the PS3 and also the PS3 is not my only client, I also have other DLNA clients.  

Anyway, it's not a big deal as I know have a version that streams.  Not seen this issues before, all other PT releases have been fine.  I can't be bothered to check if they were all mod8 :)
they weren't.  I don't bother with that.  Whatever the AR calculates to based on the 1080p release is what it comes out to.
